Summary: bright blue starlike object appears then disappears in about five seconds
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Des Moines
There were no other sightings in Des Moines on or around November 11th 2003
divs: Sighting Detailson that night of November 2003 i was walking down a trail then in the eastern sky a bright blue starlike object appeared out of nowhere it was heading east then it suddenly switched directions and shot toward the western sky and disappeared in about five seconds i was stunned i have never seen anything move so quickly
